Posts.Content: Ann Just before Christmas same scenario for my best friend.  The doc wanted to wait till NY but we got her another appointment.  Her lump turned out to be scar tissue and some inflamation.  She did take a natural supplement while waiting and it reduced the lump 50% and took out most of the inflamation.  Lump is now gone, no inflamation and she has been declared cancer free.  Her breast surgery was 12 years ago..So it is harrowing but could turn out to be nothing.  I hope it is so..Elaine On 3/5/2007 Having Faith wrote: Thanks Wendy, I wrote back to you, but not sure if it was sent. Long story short, Thank you for your support. I will be back on here. I need to talk to other women who are going through the same thing or have already been there. Faith and prayers to all.  Ann
Posts.Title: feeling scared-

Posts.Content: Sounds like neuropoathy to me: Here is a website that talks about Armidex www.breastcancer.org/reasearch_hormonal_ 100305.html     On 4/22/2006 Jaybo wrote: Just completed chemo and radiation. On arimidex. What is causing strange heat related skin reaction? Feel like a thousand tiny sand flies all biting at once..over entire body, not just exposed skin. Also skin sensitive to weeding, fire ant poison. Is that from the treatments or from Arimidex?
